@Test public void testMinpackBard(){
  minpackTest(new BardFunction(1.0,6.45613629515967,0.0906359603390466,new double[]{0.0824105765758334,1.1330366534715,2.34369463894115}),false);
  minpackTest(new BardFunction(10.0,36.1418531596785,4.17476870138539,new double[]{0.840666673818329,-158848033.259565,-164378671.653535}),false);
  minpackTest(new BardFunction(100.0,384.114678637399,4.17476870135969,new double[]{0.840666673867645,-158946167.205518,-164464906.857771}),false);
}
